Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Misael the Anchorite:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te peniwt eyouab n~dikeoc abba Mica/l piana,writ/c: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers, of our holy and righteous father, Abba Misael the anchorite, O Lord grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
